plot: She used to dance for him, he used to play. Trapped in the dreams of yesterday, it's a torment that shows no end. Until a moment, when day meets night, that she might dance for him again. ...
title: Persephone
plot_es: She used to dance for him, he used to play. Trapped in the dreams of yesterday, it's a torment that shows no end. Until a moment, when day meets night, that she might dance for him again. ...
